enchantment.spartanweaponry.throwing_ran: Extends the throwing range of this weapon
enchantment.spartanweaponry.throwing_dam: Increases damage for this throwing weapon
enchantment.spartanweaponry.throwing_fir: Imbues this throwing weapon with fire, which sets hit targets on fire
enchantment.spartanweaponry.throwing_luc: Increases loot drops from use of this throwing weapon
enchantment.spartanweaponry.throwing_hyd: Allows throwing weapons to work underwater
This weapon can be thrown at foes
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.two_handed: Any item in the opposite hand slows down attack speed and reduces damage by %d%%
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.extra_dama: +%f%% damage when the foe has no Chest Armor
+%f%% damage when the foe has no Armor
+%f%% damage while riding a mount or vehicle
+%f%% damage when this weapon is thrown
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.damage_abs: %d%% of damage taken dealt in durability from this weapon
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.reach.desc: Increased melee damage range. Higher Reach levels have more range
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.sweep_dama: All targets in sweep range take %d%% of standard damage
All targets in sweep range take %f damage
Foes get knocked back further away
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.nausea.des: Inflicts Nausea II (%ds) on hit, unless the foe is wearing a Helmet
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.shield_bre: Chance to breach a foe's shield
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.quick_stri: This weapon can deal a flurry of quick blows with a very short hurt resistance time
Will not be destroyed when dropped in fire or lava
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.backstab.d: +200% Extra Damage when this weapon hits the back of a foe
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.heavy.desc: Slows down attack speed, ranged draw speed, loading time and throwing charge time
tooltip.spartanweaponry.grease_ball.desc: Base ingredient for Oils. Place in Bottles to begin Oil making
tooltip.spartanweaponry.dynamite.desc: Explodes %f seconds after throwing, resulting in a smaller explosion than TNT
tooltip.spartanweaponry.weapon_oil_munda: A basic oil to coat weapons with. Does nothing unless brewed with ingredients in a Brewing Stand
tooltip.spartanweaponry.weapon_oil.desc: Coat weapons with this oil to apply special bonuses to that weapon. Has limited uses.
tooltip.spartanweaponry.quiver_upgrade_k: Upgrades any Small Quiver into a Medium Quiver (Use in Smithing Table)
Upgrades any Medium Quiver into a Large Quiver (Use in Smithing Table)
Upgrades any Large Quiver into a Huge Quiver (Use in Smithing Table)
tooltip.spartanweaponry.longbow.desc: Long-range version of the standard bow
tooltip.spartanweaponry.heavy_crossbow.d: Hold the aim for a pinpoint shot
tooltip.spartanweaponry.quiver_upgrade: Upgrade using Quiver Upgrade Kits in a Smithing Table
key.spartanweaponry.category.title: Spartan Weaponry
advancement.spartanweaponry.root.title: Spartan Weaponry

Acquire any Arrow Quiver or Bolt Quiver
advancement.spartanweaponry.upgradeQuive: Upgrade any Quiver with an appropriate Quiver Upgrade Kit
Upgrade any Quiver into a Huge Quiver
advancement.spartanweaponry.craftScythe: Isn't this a Farming Tool? (Don't fear the Reaper)
advancement.spartanweaponry.bounceKill.d: Kill a mob after bouncing a Boomerang off a nearby surface
advancement.spartanweaponry.returnKill.d: Kill a mob with a Boomerang when it is returning to you
enchantment.spartanweaponry.propel.desc: Extends the throwing range of this weapon
Increases damage for this throwing weapon
enchantment.spartanweaponry.incendiary.d: Imbues this throwing weapon with fire, which sets hit targets on fire
Increases loot drops from use of this throwing weapon
enchantment.spartanweaponry.hydrodynamic: Allows throwing weapons to work underwater
Reduces charge time for throwing weapons by ~20%% per level
enchantment.spartanweaponry.expanse.desc: Increases maximum ammo capacity for throwing weapons by either 25%% or one ammo per level, whichever is greater
enchantment.spartanweaponry.sharpshooter: Reduces aim time for Heavy Crossbows by 0.1s per level
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.block_mele: Can block melee attacks, but will not block projectiles
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.extra_dama: +%f%% damage when the foe has no Chest Armor and has less than %f armor points
+%f%% damage when the foe has no Head Armor
+%f%% damage when the foe has no Head Armor and has less than %f armor points
+%f%% damage when the foe has no Armor and has less than %f armor points
+%.2f%% damage when this weapon hits the back of a foe
tooltip.spartanweaponry.trait.decapitate: Gives a %f%% chance of dropping a head or skull when killing a mob
tooltip.spartanweaponry.blaze_head.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Blaze with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.enderman_head.de: Obtained by killing an Enderman with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.spider_head.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Spider with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.cave_spider_head: Can be obtained by killing a Cave Spider with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.piglin_head.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Piglin with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.zombified_piglin: Can be obtained by killing a Zombified Piglin with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.husk_head.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Husk with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.stray_skull.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Stray with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.drowned_head.des: Can be obtained by killing a Drowned with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.illager_head.des: Can be obtained by killing a Pillager, Vindicator, Illusioner or an Evoker with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.witch_head.desc: Can be obtained by killing a Witch with a weapon with the 'Decapitate' Weapon Trait
tooltip.spartanweaponry.throwable.not_or: Cannot be repaired or enchanted and will not leave an empty stack when ammo runs out
tooltip.%s.uncraftable_missing_material: Cannot be crafted; Missing item in tag "%s"
